name: ImpossiBubble
description:
Test your brain and your reflexes. Try to combine bubbles before they reach the top and match the target before time runs out. Earn powerups along the way to help you survive longer.

With every level the bubbles appear and move faster. Chose from Beginner, Easy, Medium and Difficult Settings. Each one makes it harder by increasing spawn rate, bubble speed and reducing perks – so you’ll always be challenged.
